Summary: London, UK, Oct. 21, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- Buburuza today announced the public waitlist for its AI-powered payment platform, following a six-month private beta that tested real-time, cross-currency transfers across multiple markets using AI infrastructure.
